room_title: Escape room "The Secret Agent Room" by Xtreme Xcapes in Charlotte
review: Took my daughter and her friends for her birthday. We completed the secret agent room in 38 minutes. So much fun! Would recommend. Plan on going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret Agent Room" by Xtreme Xcapes in Charlotte
review: We went for the secret agent room and had a blast. This room really kept us thinking!

room_title: Escape room "The Secret Agent Room" by Xtreme Xcapes in Charlotte
review: Took my 12-year-old son for a day of fun. We had a blast bearing the Secret Agent room. Can't wait to come back and try the shotgun wedding. I recommend giving this a try, it's a ton of fun. And also a great bonding experience.
